name: Cube Roller - Mobile Edition
description:
Hello there! Are you lonely? maybe you work or go to school. We all know how that feels like! I have created this game for people like you and me. Play Cube Roller! you can Enjoy the peace, and silence of your room. Rolling a Cube to Left or Right, Dodging Blue Ico doters while listening to the soothing music. Hey!there is a  PC version for Mac and Windows players, if you don't like the Mobile Controls!

How to play:

Touch and Hold the Left Side of your screen to Roll the Cube to the Left Side, Touch and Hold the Right Side of your screen to Roll the Cube to the Right Side. To stop Rolling the Cube, just stop holding the screen! The Objective is Simple, Dodge the Blue Ico Doters (Spheres) by Rolling, Try to get the Highest score. Simple! right? It gets more difficult has you play on. Lets see if you can reach the Boss level!  Remember to have Fun!

To the Donaters:

I would apprieciate it if you Donate to me, this game is by far My First that I have Published. Even if its a single cent, i will be grateful for it. Thank you for trying out and Donating for me and my game :D
